structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Venue For Prosecution Of Violations Of Sec. 35 A Of Chapter 266

text.section: the county in which the residential property for which a mortgage loan is being sought is located;
the county in which any act was performed in furtherance of the violation;
the county in which any person alleged to have violated this section had control or possession of any proceeds of, or other funds received as a result of the violation;
the county in which a closing on the mortgage loan occurred; or
the county in which a document containing a deliberate misstatement, misrepresentation or omission is filed with a registrar of deeds.
